item.title: Care Safety Solutions Limited
item.description:
About Us

Care Safety Solutions Limited specializes in geriatric in-home services, providing healthy meals tailored for seniors and resources for family caregivers. Our commitment to enhancing the quality of life for elderly individuals sets us apart in the community.

Our Services

  • Geriatric In-Home Services: Professional care in the comfort of home
  • Senior Meal Programs: Healthy, tailored meals for elderly clients
  • Family Caregiver Support: Resources and guidance for caregivers

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Asha Mungal
  • Phone: 351-2273 / 252-2775
  • Email: caresafetysolutionslimited@gmail.com
  • Website: www.caresafetysolutions.com

item.title: Weldit General Contractors
item.description:
About Us

Weldit General Contractors specializes in a wide range of services including welding, fabricating, painting, landscaping, and plumbing. Our skilled team is dedicated to delivering high-quality workmanship and exceptional customer service for all your contracting needs.

Our Services

  • Welding: Professional welding and metal work
  • Fabrication: Custom metal fabrication solutions
  • Painting: Expert painting services
  • Landscaping: Complete landscape design and maintenance
  • Plumbing: Professional plumbing services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Devanand Harridass
  • Phone: 290-6083

item.title: All Nu Events and Party Rentals
item.description:
About Us

All Nu Events and Party Rentals specializes in providing high-quality rental equipment for events, including tents, chairs, tables, and portable toilets. Our commitment to exceptional service and diverse inventory ensures that your event is both memorable and hassle-free.

Our Services

  • Tent Rentals: Various sizes of quality tents for any occasion
  • Furniture Rentals: Wide selection of chairs and tables
  • Portable Toilets: Clean and well-maintained facilities
  • Event Equipment: Complete event setup solutions

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Allan Mahabir
  • Phone: 290-3700 / 290-3701
  • Email: stormerallan@hotmail.com
  • Social Media: Follow us on Facebook

item.title: Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage
item.description:
About Us

Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage specializes in the repair of heavy equipment and the installation of automatic tarpaulin systems. With a team of skilled technicians, we ensure reliable service and high-quality workmanship to keep your machinery running smoothly.

Our Services

  • Heavy Equipment Repair: Expert repair services for all types of heavy machinery
  • Tarpaulin Systems: Professional installation of automatic tarpaulin systems
  • Diesel Services: Comprehensive diesel engine maintenance and repairs
  • Equipment Maintenance: Regular maintenance programs to prevent breakdowns

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Terrance Raghunanan (Kurth)
  • Phone: 734-1245
  • Email: kurth.raghunanan6@gmail.com

item.title: Dellon Bicano Air Condition & Refrigeration Services
item.description:
About Us

Dellon Bicano Air Condition & Refrigeration Services specializes in the supply, installation, repair, and servicing of air conditioning units and refrigerators. With a commitment to quality and customer satisfaction, we ensure optimal performance and reliability for all your cooling needs.

Our Services

  • AC Installation: Professional installation of air conditioning units
  • Refrigeration Services: Complete refrigeration system solutions
  • Repair Services: Expert repairs for AC and refrigeration units
  • Maintenance: Regular servicing and maintenance programs

item.title: Simpsons Memorial Ltd.
item.description:
About Us

Simpsons Memorial Ltd. provides compassionate funeral services with a focus on personalized care and dignity. We offer comprehensive funeral arrangements including cremation and burial options, supported by professional limousine rental services to ensure a respectful and comfortable experience for families during their time of need.

Our Services

  • Funeral Services: Complete funeral arrangements with personalized attention
  • Cremation Services: Professional cremation options with dignified ceremonies
  • Burial Services: Traditional burial services with customized arrangements
  • Limousine Rentals: Luxury transportation for funeral proceedings

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: David Simpson
  • Phone: 623-8688 / 610-8688
  • Email: simpsonsmemorialltd@hotmail.com

item.title: KAS Chartered Accountant
item.description:
About Us

KAS Chartered Accountant offers comprehensive financial services including financial statements preparation, taxation filing, payroll management, and corporate secretarial and advisory services. Our expertise ensures compliance and strategic financial planning for businesses of all sizes.

Our Services

  • Financial Statements: Professional preparation of financial statements and reports
  • Taxation Filing: Comprehensive tax preparation and filing services
  • Payroll Management: Complete payroll processing and management solutions
  • Corporate Services: Secretarial and advisory services for businesses

Contact Information

  • Phone: 309-9994
  • Email: ksieusankar@gmail.com

item.title: Land Surveying
item.description:
About Us

Land Surveying offers professional land surveying services, specializing in boundary surveys, topographic surveys, and construction staking. With a commitment to accuracy and customer satisfaction, we utilize advanced technology to deliver precise results for residential and commercial projects.

Our Services

  • Boundary Surveys: Precise determination and marking of property boundaries
  • Topographic Surveys: Detailed mapping of land features and elevations
  • Construction Staking: Accurate layout guidance for construction projects

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Rishi Seetaram
  • Phone: 753-7189
  • Email: rishi_seetaram@yahoo.com

item.description:
About Us

Avid Business Solutions offers comprehensive services in accounting, taxation, and business registrations, including the incorporation of companies. With a focus on personalized service and expert advice, we help businesses navigate their financial needs efficiently.

item.title: Insurance Sales and Services
item.description:
About Us

Insurance Sales and Services offers a comprehensive range of insurance products including life insurance, annuities, critical illness coverage, and property insurance. Our expert team is dedicated to providing personalized solutions to meet your financial security and investment needs.

Our Services

  • Life Insurance: Comprehensive life insurance policies for financial security
  • Annuities: Long-term investment solutions for retirement planning
  • Critical Illness Coverage: Protection against major medical conditions and healthcare costs

  • Property Insurance: Coverage for residential and commercial properties

item.title: Simple Wow Solutions Limited
item.description:
About Us

Simple Wow Solutions Limited offers a comprehensive range of services including insurance solutions, executive coaching, business consulting, and professional training programs. Our unique approach combines expertise and personalized strategies to empower businesses and individuals to achieve their goals.

Our Services

  • Insurance Solutions: Comprehensive insurance planning and risk management
  • Executive Coaching: Leadership development and performance enhancement
  • Business Consulting: Strategic planning and process optimization
  • Professional Training: Customized training solutions and skill development
